issue.title: [C++] used uninitialized warning
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-3852](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-3852). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
```Java

    In file included from ../src/arrow/util/bit-util-test.cc:35:
    ../src/arrow/util/bit-stream-utils.h: In function 'void arrow::TestZigZag(int32_t)':

         memcpy(&buffered_values_, buffer_ + byte_offset_, num_bytes);
         ~~~~~~^~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
```
